page.title: 05PARKS AND SPORTS GROUNDS
page.content: In our area there are a lot of parks and sports grounds. We counted 12 parks and 8 sports grounds. The biggest park is Gosport Park where there is a large childrens play ground and its own sports ground. People use the park for walking dogs or playing around with a football or a cricket set. It is a very peaceful place and on a clear day you have good view across the River Alver to Haslar Bridge, the Naval Cemetry and even Portsmouth Cathedral and the Guildhall. On the whole the recreation facilities are quite adequate and cater for all ages and interests.
